comment.author: 21487369@N03
comment._content: It's the summer of 2011, and temperatures in Houston have hovered around 100 F for weeks now.  I thought perhaps looking at photos of winter scenes would help me to "think cool thoughts."  I was right!

comment.realname: Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County
